name: iconify-cli
description: A CLI for downloading Iconify icons in various formats
author: Christoph Koschel

scripts.build: npm run build:templates && tsdown --entry.lib src/lib/index.ts --entry.bin src/bin/index.ts --format esm --dts --sourcemap
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:templates && tsdown --entry.lib src/lib/index.ts --entry.bin src/bin/index.ts --format esm --dts --minify
scripts.docs:api: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin typedoc-plugin-mdn-links --plugin typedoc-plugin-inline-sources --plugin typedoc-vitepress-theme --readme none --out ./docs/api ./src/lib/index.ts
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:api && vitepress build docs
